Negative_Review: The cleaning detergent they used for the room was very strong and gave me a headache and the location is very far off from anything

Negative_Review: When we visited Paris temperature was touching 32 degree Room AC was not working properly First it was very slow It used to take at least 1 hour to lower the temperature by even 2 degrees Second it never went below 24 25 even though we tried setting it to 20 Problem was not resolved even after informing the staff

Negative_Review: Being a solo female traveler I was always concerned walking from the Metro station late at night as the hotel was located on a relatively quiet street

Negative_Review: There was a hole in the wall by the bed

Positive_Review: It s a lovely hotel very conveniently located Plenty of buses nearby toward Opera or Champs Elysees The staff is really so helpful and trying their utmost to make the stay agreeable Breakfast was perfect the best tea in town marriage Freres Thank you very much

Negative_Review: The private parking only has few spots and almost all of them are for narrow cars Our rental fit in it but bigger than a renault clio would have been impossible The area may surprise some as it is not as romantic and picturesque as the city centre but there are many wonderful shops and restaurants for those ready to seek and we walked to Champs Elysees in 20 minutes We got a standard room which meant affordable but small and viewless
Positive_Review: The breakfast was wonderful and the bed very comfy The staff was welcoming and helped every chance they got reception opened 24 7 There are many good places to eat around and a lovely daily market in rue de Levis

Negative_Review: Small room Breakfast wasn t the best Our second day after cleaning the room they left us without towels or toilet paper
Positive_Review: Was in a nice neighborhood

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Air conditioning very poor and the weather was hot Too noisy to have the window open Staff were very friendly at reception breakfast could of been more organised constantly running out of everything like coffee and bread

Negative_Review: Problems with parking Hotel have a private parking but very complicate to find because it s after two streets and parking is underground floor with no lights and only for very very small car
Positive_Review: Room das very clean Bed very comfortable staf named Aleksandro was very friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: Breakfast is in the Celler in room with no windows The room was a little to warm The cheese for breakfast was starting to sweat
Positive_Review: Parking here is really a Problem I eneded up parking my car in a privat park house Securitas which cost 20 for the night

Negative_Review: The photos of the room we received were actually of a more expensive room and we were suggested to make an upgrade if we wanted to get a more comfortable option

Positive_Review: Great stay 6 stops from the city centre The most helpful people like Edith and Alexandre are there to help you thanks guy only wish we could have seen you before we left

Negative_Review: Location was a little out but really ideal for montmarte and the bohemian side of Paris wasn t too bad a bus journey to the centre but it was a little difficult to get used to
Positive_Review: Staff were really friendly helped us work out the best way to get to where we needed to be to see the sights

Negative_Review: Bigger quantity at breakfast goes very quickly
Positive_Review: The staff Very friendly and helpful Our first time in Paris so they got us a map and circled places we had to see whilst also writing down what lines we would have to take to get there vinthe metro

Negative_Review: No negative points during our short 3 night stay
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely helpful The front desk told us the best way to get into the centre of town was to take the bus instead of the train The woman took out a map and drew out all the places to go and which number of bus would get us there etc Very good service

Negative_Review: The corridors had all sorts of things in them old doors and pieces of wood were everywhere on the way to my room I had to mind my way The location was very bad and the metro station was 10 minutes at least away Certainly will not visit again
Positive_Review: The room although was not spacious was nice and comfortable

Negative_Review: The pictures are misleading Grubby experience Bathroom was not clean ie subtle urine stains on underside of toilet Perhaps I expected too much for a fair price of 70 for the night however I would definitely not stay here again with my girlfriend
Positive_Review: Nice bed

Negative_Review: Weather
Positive_Review: I dont normally write reviews but on this occasion I have to The staff especially reception staff were just superb They were friendly efficient and they really went above and beyond to make our stay in Paris a wonderful experience They went above and beyond their post and that needs to be acknowledged Great job guys you are an incredible asset to this hotel

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The staff were very helpful when we wanted to enquire about going out on trips they organised everything for us from ringing to ask how we get to the places where we want to go then calling us to let us know the prices and then calling back to book it for us they ordered taxis for when we needs to leave they went above and beyond to make our stay a relaxing one

Negative_Review: The room has a weird smell went after leaving the window open for a short amount of time
Positive_Review: The staff we re very welcoming and spoken good English which made everything easier

Negative_Review: Booking done true your site and next day the hotel contact me that they have no rooms availble and replaced me to an other poor expensive hotel So sad abouth their administration Also the payment was not done how we asked for
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: I would totally give this place 4 stars but on my check out the desk staff asked if I needed a taxi I said no I could easily walk outside and catch one of the many that were waiting across the street there is a taxi pick up spot across the street with a line of taxis waiting He said no I will call it is better So I waited and took his taxi my fare to Gare de Lyon was 22 70 euro but when I went to pay it he handed me a bill for ten dollars more claiming it was because they had called him To say I was angry is the understatement of the century I thought the manager was being nice turns out he was ripping me off
Positive_Review: The bed was great The room was cute the hotel was really well located in a very cool non touristy part of town with tons of ethnic restaurants

Negative_Review: Sheer a bit slippery A mat in the bath to stand on would be goog
Positive_Review: The room was good and staff friendly Only a short walk to thr Malascherbes Metro Supermarket 200 meters away

Negative_Review: The room stank of stale cigarette smoke and was very very dark even with all the lights on It was a tiny corner room with a double bed against the wall You could barely open the door all the way because of the bed The bed was uncomfortable and when we looked underneath one of the legs was broken We picked this hotel as it looked like an interesting boutique hotel The view from our window was of a wall and some pipes The room was NOT soundproof as advertised and there was no DVD player Trip was intended to be a romantic break but the room was truly awful
Positive_Review: Area was lovely with lots of amenities and the staff were very friendly

Negative_Review: The shower was good but the shower curtain was rubbish the water leaked out the side of it onto the tiles The air conditioning system was not good it was noisy even when off The breakfast was 17 euros each for continental which is very expensive The bar was very small for a hotel and expensive
Positive_Review: The bed was comfy and the room was clean

Negative_Review: I am sure they had a shoe polisher previously but when I asked about it the receptionist reacted like I am asking for a magic cookie Anyway also they ask you to come down to get the ironing board I think at a hotel they should be bringing it to you Otherwise I love the modern rooms and the air conditioning was amazing Definitely would go again
